item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Kimmy add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
